attributes.action: Remove Christopher Rodrigues at Chairman of Visit Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christopher Rodrigues, formerly Chief Executive of Bradford & Bingley Building Society, is the man who started the downfall of this once great financial institution.  Under his leadership this business made some of the most ridiculous decisions which ultimately has cost the jobs of thousands of ordinary hard-working individuals with mortgages to pay and families to feed.  He did not have the skills required to run a financial institution nor does he have the skills required to run our Tourist Industry.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
